# listmap

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of listmap is to get thelist imagery. 

## Installation

You can install ...


## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(listmap)
library(raster)
for (ilayer in 3:14) {
  plotRGB(listmap(layer = ilayer))
}
```
